attributes.action: Pay a decent wage for pensioners!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
If senior citizens were paid a decent living wage then they wouldn't have to resort to claiming benefits ie. Pension Credit in order to survive.  Why is it against the law for employers to pay workers less than the minimum wage but ok for the Government to pay pensioners, many of whom have fought for this god forsaken, over taxed nation, a pittance and expect them to have a decent standard of living in their latter years.
